release.change: Breaking Change: Updated User Agent String format to also include the WebView User Agent
Add new notification command to allow for changing Persistent Connection setting
Allow persistent connection to work when the device has no internet
Migrate Manage Sensors screen to Compose, small design tweaks and speed improvements
Allow changing high accuracy update interval via notification command

Add missing volume level sensors and allow control via notification command for some of them
Bug fixes, design tweaks and dependency updates
